meanings: replace, (잠시 동안) substitute (for), cover (for), stand in (for), fill in (for), (informal) sub (for)

vlive.korean: 그럼 제 일도 선생님께서 좀 대신해 주실래요? Will you do chores for me? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 너와 내가 키스한 이유 [연애미수] EP07 재미 있는 일이 생길 때마다 너에게 말해주고 싶었
vlive.english: Will you do chores for me?

vlive.korean: 지효가 대신해주기로 했지 - 진짜? JIHYO promised to do that instead of me. - Really? 듣기 View video TWICE : 쯔가 사줫어요...그래서 한번 해보고싶어서...ㅋㅋ
vlive.english: JIHYO promised to do that instead of me. - Really?

vlive.korean: [창빈이 형을 대신해 열심히 수습] 우리 스테이한테 베이베... [Explaining for CHANGBIN] It's for STAY. "Baby". 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 3팀3색 스트레이 키즈가 런던 거리에 뜬 이유는?｜Stray Kids: 제9구역 시즌5 EP.01
내가 힘들어하면서까지 요리를 대신 해줄 필요는 없잖아요? There's no need to have a hard time in cooking for someone else, right? 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 🎒+ 🐳
vlive.english: There's no need to have a hard time in cooking for someone else, right?

vlive.korean: 그래서 이걸로 대신해 피지를 한번 녹여볼게요. I will use this to melt my blackheads instead. 듣기 View video HANABONO : 피르가즘 주의! 코팩으로 턱피지 뽑는게 가능할까?
vlive.english: I will use this to melt my blackheads instead.

examples.korean: You don’t have to make excuses for her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 그녀를 대신해 변명할 필요는 없어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You don’t have to make excuses for her. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The local bus service was a poor substitute for their car. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지역의 버스 운행 서비스는 그들의 자가용을 제대로 대신해 주지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The local bus service was a poor substitute for their car. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I plan to e-mail Steve to ask him to take over my work for a few days. 듣기 Add to Wordbook Steve에게 며칠간 제 업무를 대신해 달라고 이메일로 요청할 계획입니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I plan to e-mail Steve to ask him to take over my work for a few days. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me. (Carol Burnett) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나만이 내 인생을 바꿀 수 있다. 아무도 날 대신해 해줄 수 없다. (캐롤 버넷, 인생명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me. (Carol Burnett) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It is true that I was born in Iowa, but I can't speak for my twin sister. (Abigail Van Buren) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 아이오와에서 태어난 것은 사실이나 내 쌍둥이 여동생을 대신해 말할 수는 없다. (애비게일 반 뷰렌, 인생명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: It is true that I was born in Iowa, but I can't speak for my twin sister. (Abigail Van Buren) Add to Wordbook
